resources.string: 가족과 함께 하루에 한 장\n아이의 성장을 기록해요!
가족과 지인을 초대해 소식을 공유하고,\n이야기를 나눠볼까요?
같은 그룹인 경우에만 댓글이 보여요!\n편하게 대화를 나누어요 :)
로그인에 실패했습니다. 다시 한번 확인해 주세요
나와 아이, 가족의 성장을 기록하는 바바에 오신 걸 환영해요!
바바에서 사용할 이름을 입력해주세요.\n[마이]에서 변경 가능해요."
필수 약관이 모두 동의 되지 않았습니다.
Camera could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).
This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime.\nClick the button below to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.

This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime. Click the button to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.
Note: The "RuntimePermissions" sample provides a more complete overview over the runtime permission features available.
Camera access is required to display the camera preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Camera permission is available. Starting preview.
Camera permission was granted. Starting preview.
We need permission to use your camera

This app relies on read access to your contacts. We require access to this permission to find your contacts in our database and suggest people you may know. We will not store any contact info in our data base if they are not a part of our platform. For further info read our privacy policy.
